about.description: I build fast, AI-powered web apps with Next.js/Vite, Firebase/Supabase, and OpenAI. Recently I launched sabacan365.com (AI English quizzes from YouTube) and several finance tools like a NISA withdrawal optimizer. I love clean UI, solid data models, and automations with Google Apps Script.
